summary: This is an FBI report documenting an anonymous tip from a therapist to the FBI National Threat Operations Center. The caller reported that a client (the Victim) has been trafficked since age five and was sexually abused by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell between ages 7-9 and as a teenager. The Victim is currently being stalked and beaten by her lifelong trafficker (UNSUB) and fears for her life if she reports the abuse.

persons.name: Anonymous
persons.context: A therapist who anonymously called the FBI to report that her client (the Victim) has been trafficked her whole life and was abused by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named by the anonymous therapist as someone the Victim was taken to for sexual abuse between ages 7-9 and as a teenager.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described by the anonymous therapist as an active participant in the sexual abuse and exploitation of the Victim.

persons.name: UNSUB
persons.context: An unidentified man who has trafficked, stalked, beaten, and abused the Victim her whole life, causing her severe injuries requiring multiple surgeries.

connections.description: Both are named as perpetrators involved in the sexual abuse and exploitation of the Victim.
UNSUB has trafficked, beaten, and abused the Victim her entire life, causing severe physical injuries.
The Victim was taken to Jeffrey Epstein for sexual abuse between ages 7-9 and as a teenager.
Ghislaine Maxwell was an active participant in the sexual abuse and exploitation of the Victim.
Anonymous is a therapist who has been gathering information from the Victim for approximately one year and nine months.

events.title: Anonymous Tip to FBI NTOC
events.description: An anonymous therapist called the FBI National Threat Operations Center to report a client being trafficked and abused, including by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Childhood Rape by Police Officer
events.description: When the Victim was five years old, an unidentified police officer raped her with his gun, leading to her distrust of police.

events.title: Sexual Abuse by Epstein and Maxwell
events.description: The Victim was taken to Jeffrey Epstein between ages 7-9 and as a teenager, with Ghislaine Maxwell participating in the sexual abuse and exploitation.

events.title: Ongoing Abuse and Stalking by UNSUB
events.description: The Victim is currently being stalked, beaten, and abused by UNSUB, her lifelong trafficker, requiring multiple surgeries for genital injuries.

keyFacts: An anonymous therapist reported to the FBI that her client (the Victim) has been trafficked since approximately age five.
The Victim was sexually abused by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell between ages 7-9 and periodically as a teenager.
The Victim was raped with a gun by an unidentified police officer at age five, leading to deep distrust of law enforcement.
The Victim is currently being stalked and beaten by her lifelong trafficker (UNSUB), suffering injuries requiring multiple genital surgeries.
The therapist connected the Victim's story to Epstein after watching documentaries, noting similarities in descriptions of a house and fence.
